commit_msg: fix factor of 2. fix test. fix docs gobal_fold (#125)
annotator_comment: The bug is in the unitary folding procedure which is used to amplify the noise artificially by reapplying the same gate a number of times. The bug consisted in the wrong formula to compute the remaining gate to apply, usually we should apply G and G inverse to make sure that the final unitary is still preserved. The formula missed a 2 factor which accounts for the couple (G, G inverse).
